title: Have been using thunderbird for my emails for years, but can not add three email accounts that used to be here but can't add now. HELP.
content: Can't add three existing email accounts to thunderbird. It tells me that they are not configured correctly. These accounts were working in thunderbird until about a year ago. When I changed my computer, only two of my five accounts would add. I have been doing without them but now I need them back. Please help me see why I can't add these three accounts. I am running Thunderbird 115.5.1 (64-bit) The accounts that I am having trouble with are .sbcglobal.net accounts. The ones that work are a .Yahoo.com account and a .gmail.com account.
creator: paul.kleewein2

title: Can not send emails
content:
I have used Thunderbird for 20 years but suddenly my emails will not send. I have tried all outgoing server settings options as per information from iinet and thunderbird but nothing works. IInet are refusing to acknowledge any fault and have said it is a Thunderbird issue. I'm just the user caught in the middle without being able to run our company email and want it fixed.

I have attached error messages for all options I have tried.

Anne-Marie
creator: dasprint
